DOC.brief_summary: This Phase III , global , multicenter , open-label , randomize study compare efficacy safety 16 cycle ( 1 cycle duration=21 day ) atezolizumab ( MPDL3280A ) treatment compare best supportive care ( BSC ) participant Stage IB-Stage IIIA non-small cell lung cancer ( NSCLC ) follow resection adjuvant chemotherapy , measure disease-free survival ( DFS ) assess investigator overall survival ( OS ) . Participants , complete 4 cycle adjuvant cisplatin-based chemotherapy , randomize 1:1 ratio receive atezolizumab 16 cycle BSC .
DOC.brief_title: Study Assess Safety Efficacy Atezolizumab ( MPDL3280A ) Compared Best Supportive Care Following Chemotherapy Patients With Lung Cancer IMpower010
